title: Major Mexican Cartel Leader Arrested
teaser: Another Mexican cartel leader is behind bars. Police arrested Servando "La Tuta" Gomez, a leader in the Knights Templar cartel. The cartel trafficked methamphetamine in the United States and once dominated the Mexican state of Michoacan through extortion, killings and kidnapping.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
